Mode: random or sequentially, (How should the path to the image be created (in 36-bit format))
Length: [from, to], or number Path length to the image (by default from 4 to 6 (randomly or not, depends on mode))
Filter Bad Paths: (y/n), On 'y' doesn't display an error in the console about an invalid path
Log: (y/n), Enables logging of received links and their success status
Streams: number, from 1 to 4, that's how many streams program will be use.
